dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 5952 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 123 East Main Street, in Vergas, Minnesota, as the “Jon Glawe Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 123 East Main Street, in Vergas, Minnesota, as the Jon Glawe Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 123 East Main Street, in Vergas, Minnesota, shall be known and designated as the Jon Glawe Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Jon Glawe Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 13, 2022.
